attributes.action: call a General Election, rather than nominating a successor, in the event of his resignation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current Government has run its course and a repeat of the Thatcher/Major transition at the end of the Conservative encumbancy would be intolerable. The voting Public should decide the new Prime Minister in order to exercise the true powers of democracy that supposedly still exist in our Country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
